text: was a Japanese politician. He was the 74th Prime Minister of Japan from 6 November 1987 to 3 June 1989.French, Howard W. "Noboru Takeshita, Premier Who Guided Political Power in Japan, Is Dead at 76," New York Times. 19 June 2000. Takeshita died on 19 June 2000 in Tokyo, Japan from respiratory failure, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1924 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Politicians from Shimane Prefecture Category:Waseda University alumni Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Chief Cabinet Secretaries of Japan Category:Ministers of finance of Japan
title: Noboru Takeshita
